data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Dear Annie,
My ____ friend! Since ____ is ____ wedding ____ week, I ____ wondering ____ you ____ be ____ to ____ my ____ on Sunday. I'll ____ busy ____ all ____ celebrations, and ____ really ____ your ____. If you don't mind, please let me know by Wednesday so that I can make other plans if I need to.
data.partBlankContent:
Dear Annie,
My de__ friend! Since i_ is m_ wedding ne__ week, I w__ wondering i_ you wo___ be wil____ to wa___ my gar___ on Sunday. I'll b_ busy wi__ all t__ celebrations, and co___ really u__ your assis_____. If you don't mind, please let me know by Wednesday so that I can make other plans if I need to.
data.fullContent: Dear Annie, My dear friend! Since it is my wedding next week, I was wondering if you would be willing to watch my garden on Sunday. I'll be busy with all the celebrations, and could really use your assistance. If you don't mind, please let me know by Wednesday so that I can make other plans if I need to.
data.answer: 亲爱的安妮， 我亲爱的朋友！因为下周是我的婚礼，我在想你是否愿意照看我的花园。我将忙着庆祝，真的希望得到你的援助。如果你不介意的话，请在周三前通知我，这样如果我有需要，我可以做其他计划。
